## DBErrorXMetadata type

Metadata type for database errors. Provides context about the database operation that failed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type DBErrorXMetadata = {
    query?: string;
    table?: string;
    database?: string;
    operation?: 'SELECT' | 'INSERT' | 'UPDATE' | 'DELETE' | 'TRANSACTION' | 'CONNECTION' | string;
    column?: string;
    constraint?: string;
    duration?: number;
};
```
